title: Kristian sipaite u Lalpa chakna ringin
lyrics:
Kristian sipaite u, Lalpa chakna ringin,
Chanchin Tha thianghlim tlangaupui ula;
Indona leh lungngaihna tuipui fawn vel mahsela,
Lalpa hmingin tu nge min do thei ang?

Nghet takin i ding ang,
Beramno thisena bualin;
Lalber sipaite kan ni, a thu min tiam ang zelin,
Lallukhum ropui kan hlawh ang.

Krista hmachhuanin thim lal kulh i tawn ang u,
In khandaih phawi ula, hma lam tawn r'u;
Lalpa Krista chua,"In hmaah ka ding zel ang," a ti,
A thutiam ang zelin kan ngam ngei ang.

Tin, khawvel lungngaihna leh fiahna kan hlenin,
Van hmun nuama kan mi duh takte nen,
Bang lovin Lalpa ropuina fakin kan zai tawh ang,
Chutah tah leh lungngaih a awm lo vang.
